message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $170. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I understand you're looking to save a bit more, but I'm still not willing to go below $160. I think this product is worth it, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $155?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit too high. Would you be willing to consider a price of $145?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more offer. Would you consider $152?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $142?
I'm not willing to go as low as $142. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more offer. Would you consider $148?
I understand you're sticking to your price, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to consider a price of $138?
I'm not willing to go as low as $138. I think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make one more offer. Would you consider $145?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you consider a price of $140.5?
